ComicInfo.Summary: Special All-Continental Issue!! All-New Material!! Not A Single Reprint!! This month, our entire issue of FF is given over to stories completely produced by some of our favorite European creators. First off, the lead story, contributed by Spain's Man of Bronze Studios, features the rvival of yet 12 more not-previously-seen actual superheroes from comicdom's Golden Age!! Music Master! The Lightning!! Black Fury!! Green Mask!! Man O' Metal!! Twilight!! Samson!! Yarko!! The Twister, and Lady Fairplay, in a gripping saga entitled "Return of the Century"!! But when these powerhouses from the past return, will it be as friend or foe? It is up to the Femforce (plus guest-stars Dr. Jonathan Weir, Fighting Yank, The Haunter, Yankee Girl, Pyroman, The Liberator and American Crusader) to find out. From a plot by Pedro Angosto, with art by Carlos Rodriguez, Luis Lorente, Pablo Alcalde, Daniel Albuixech, Jose Sanchez, Albert Puig, and Miguel Angel Lopez. Then, The Snarling She-Cat tangles with a mysterious assasin who comes to a fiery denoument in "Burn, Baby, Burn!!"; written by Francesca Paolucci and Enrico Teodorani, with art by Antonio Conversano. Finally, a tale set in the far-off '40's, with the beautiful Blue Bulleteer at the mercy of her arch-foe Lady Luger- until Miss Masque intervenes!! It's called "The Whip of Lady Luger, and it comes from the talented team of Teodorani and Conversano. A very different but interesting take on the lovely ladies of Femforce this issue. 44 pages, standard comic book size, color covers with black and white interiors.
ComicInfo.Title: The Whip of Lady Luger; Burn, Baby, Burn!; Return of the Century!
ComicInfo.Writer: Carlos Rodriguez,Enrico Teodorani,Francesca Paolucci,Mark Heike,Pedro Angosto,Stephanie Heike
